mapper.select: select * from cart where goods_idx=#{goods_idx} and mem_idx=#{mem_idx}

select c.goods_idx ,c.cart_idx ,c.mem_idx ,c.product_count ,c.is_deleted ,g.goods_name ,g.goods_rate_price ,g.goods_price ,g.goods_brand ,g.image_url ,g.country from cart c left join goods g on c.goods_idx=g.goods_idx where c.mem_idx=#{mem_idx}

select c.goods_idx, c.cart_idx, c.mem_idx, c.product_count, c.is_deleted, g.goods_name, g.goods_price, g.goods_rate_price, g.goods_price * c.product_count as goods_count_price , g.goods_rate_price * c.product_count as goods_count_rate_price , g.goods_brand, g.image_url, g.country from cart c left join goods g on c.goods_idx = g.goods_idx where c.mem_idx = #{mem_idx} and c.cart_idx in
#{item}

select IFNULL(sum(g.goods_rate_price * c.product_count),0) as total_amount_all from cart c left join goods g on c.goods_idx = g.goods_idx where c.mem_idx = #{mem_idx} and c.cart_idx in
#{item}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (mem_idx, goods_idx, product_count) VALUES (#{mem_idx},#{goods_idx},#{product_count})
mapper.update: update cart set is_deleted=1 where goods_idx=#{goods_idx}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where is_deleted=1 and mem_idx=#{mem_idx}
